name: Braintree Donations
author: FasterThemes

sections.description:
The Braintree Donations plugin allows websites to accept one time or recurring donations using Braintree payment Gateway.

More documentation

Go to http://braintreedonations.fasterthemes.com/

Demo

Go to http://braintreedonations.fasterthemes.com/
sections.installation:
You can install Braintree Donations directly from the WordPress admin panel:

1. Visit the Plugins > Add New and search for 'Braintree Donations'.
2. Click to install.
3. Once installed, activate and it is functional.

OR

Manual Installation:

1. Download the plugin, then extract it.
2. Upload `categories-images` extracted folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
3. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress

You’re done! The Plugin is ready to use, for more please check the plugin description.

More documentation

Go to http://braintreedonations.fasterthemes.com/
